TopicTitle: When I use the "Switch Editor" button, it reverts all facilities back to level 1, even on Science mode.

Articles.Content:
This issue has been bugging me forever,  and the only fix is to restart the game if it occurs. I would really like it if someone has a fix?

Thanks,

Omni

Nevermind, I just figured out the culprit mod.

It's Custom Barnkit causing the issue.
